hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: server_list
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.defaultValue: ######## Column Explained: ssh server ip, ssh port, ssh username 172.17.0.3:22:root

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: file_list
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.defaultValue:
# Jenkins backup eval: find /var/lib/jenkins/jobs -name config.xml # Confluence backup eval: find /var/atlassian/application-data/confluence/backups/ -name *.zip -printf '%T@ %p\n' | sort -n | tail -n 1 | awk -F' ' '{print $2}' # JIRA backup eval: find /var/atlassian/application-data/jira/export/ -name *.zip -printf '%T@ %p\n' | sort -n | tail -n 1 | awk -F' ' '{print $2}'
# apache /etc/apache2/sites-enabled /etc/httpd/conf.d
# autostart and config files /etc/rc.local /var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/ /root/.ssh/ /etc/hosts
# ssh /root/.ssh/authorized_keys /home/centos/authorized_keys /home/ubuntu/authorized_keys
# general /opt/devops/

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -e function download_script() { local download_file=${1?} . /etc/profile [ -n "$DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME" ] || export DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME="tag_v2" working_dir="/var/lib/jenkins/code/devops_public" bash_script="${working_dir}/${download_file}" dir_name=$(dirname "$bash_script")
export DOWNLOAD_PREFIX="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DennyZhang/devops_public/${DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME}" if [ ! -f "$bash_script" ]; then mkdir -p "$dir_name" wget -O "$bash_script" "${DOWNLOAD_PREFIX}/jenkins_scripts/${download_file}" chmod 755 "$bash_script" fi } ################################################################################ download_file="jenkins/collect_files.sh" download_script "$download_file" bash -e "/var/lib/jenkins/code/devops_public/$download_file"
